leve.name: If You Put It That Way
leve.description: Aspirants to the Foreign Brigade! The Holy See of Ishgard begs our assistance. Is your blood red enough to hunt the frost aevis that bedevils these short-lived sons and daughters of the Fury? Will your heart fail you when the aevis summons other minions of the dragon? Or will you stand, and laugh in the face of death!?
